programme.title: Rabid (1977)
programme.desc: Surgery leaves a Montreal motorcyclist (Marilyn Chambers) with a bloodsucking appendage in her armpit.

programme.title: Stepfather II
programme.desc: The Stepfather impersonates a marriage counselor and manages to win over a patient and her young son.

programme.title: And Now The Screaming Starts!
programme.desc: A young bride to be becomes the victim of her fiance's family's curse.

programme.title: Hammer House of Horror
programme.sub-title: Hammer House Of Horror: S1 E2 - The Thirteenth Reunion
programme.desc: A reporter investigating a health farm stumbles upon a horrifying truth behind a secret society that is connected to it, and must now fear for her life.

programme.title: White Zombie
programme.desc: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiance, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: I Eat Your Skin
programme.desc: While hosting "I Eat Your Skin," Elvira complains that there's no actual flesh eating in the film, so she invents the I Eat Your Skin Diet.

programme.title: MST3K: The Touch Of Satan
programme.desc: A young man gets lost while driving, and becomes the guest of a young woman who turns out to be a witch.

programme.title: Funeral Home
programme.desc: A young woman turns her Grandmother's house into a B&B. Shortly after, guests wind up missing or dead.

programme.title: Studio 666
programme.desc: Legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into a mansion steeped in music history to record their next album. Once there, Dave Grohl finds himself grappling with supernatural forces.

programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: Lisa And The Devil [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: A tourist spends the night in a derelict Spanish villa seemingly held in the supernatural grip of an eccentric butler, who resembles a depiction of the Devil she had seen on an old fresco.

programme.title: The Ninth Configuration
programme.desc: A military psychiatrist takes charge of an army mental hospital situated in a secluded castle filled with eccentric patients.

programme.title: Backlot
programme.sub-title: Backlot: Humanoids From The Deep: Interview With Roger Corman
programme.desc: Interviews with Roger Corman, second unit/assistant director James Sbardellati, composer James Horner and Cindy Weintraub

programme.title: Howling V: The Rebirth
programme.desc: A group of strangers visit an ancient Hungarian castle and bring along a werewolf.

programme.title: Twins of Evil
programme.desc: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Katy, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.
